_header: That ilk day be out of mind
_description: Job’s Curse (Job III. 3) — a single couplet

BLHar7322.Transcription: þat ylke day be out of Mindeþat y was bron to Monnes kuynde

Set out as verse lines though inserted in a Latin text with Latin prose text continuing in narrow column to right; Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
